content: chain 6 and double_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 6 single_crochet in the next 4 dcs 2 scs in the next double_crochet 5 times single_crochet in each double_crochet and chain to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 7 double_crochet in each single_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 8 single_crochet in the next 5 dcs 2 scs in the next double_crochet 5 times single_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 9 double_crochet in each single_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 10 single_crochet in the next 6 dcs 2 scs in the next double_crochet 4 times single_crochet to the end of the row fasten_off left front chain 28 insert hook into the first double_crochet on the left side of the hood and single_crochet in each stitch along the bottom of the hood to the marked stitch row 1 double_crochet in the next 2 scs 2 dcs in the next single_crochet 5 times double_crochet to the end of the bottom of the hood and the chain stitches chain 1 and turn row 2 single_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 3 double_crochet in the next 3 scs 2 dcs in the next single_crochet 5 times double_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 4 single_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 5 double_crochet in the next 4 scs 2 dcs in the next single_crochet 5 times double_crochet in each single_crochet and chain to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 6 single_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 7 double_crochet in the next 5 scs 2 dcs in the next single_crochet 5 times double_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 8 single_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 9 double_crochet in the next 6 scs 2 dcs in the next single_crochet 4 times double_crochet to the end of the row chain 1 and turn row 10 single_crochet in each double_crochet to the end of the row fasten_off note our sample had ample yarn to work all 10 row if you are running short just stop at 8 row finishing sew seam joining the right and left sides at the back of the section below the hood work 1 row of single_crochet around the front of the hood try working 3 scs in every 2 row of double_crochet for a smooth edge ©2019 plymouth yarn co design by sue hilger 040419jbt abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet
